techie.title: The Little Techie
techie.subtitle: Chronicling my adventures in software engineering
techie.description: TLT was started as a blog (www.thelittletechie.blogspot.com) on April 2012. Later the dot com (www.thelittletechie.com) was launched on 30th January 2015. The site is a parallax design and also responsive - works well on multiple devices. It is all about design and development.

author.name: Vivin Antony
author.subtitle: Founder, designer, developer, writer
author.description: Here I write mostly about software, technology, codings, my development/research works or anything that happens to interests me. If you are looking for something specific, you are at the right place.
author.quote: If at first you don't succeed; call it version 1.0
